meanings.sent1: I saw colorful gurnets swimming in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen caught a large gurnets for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The gurnets in the tank seemed to be having a fishy conversation.
meanings.sent4: The gurnets moved gracefully through the water like dancers.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the beauty of the gurnets in the aquarium.

meanings.definition: Gurnets (verb): to make a grimace or contorted facial expression
meanings.sent1: She gurnets when she tastes something sour.
meanings.sent2: The comedian gurnets to entertain the audience.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't help but gurnets at the funny movie.
meanings.sent4: The mirror reflected her gurnets back at her.
meanings.sent5: His gurnets always make us laugh during family dinners.
